snippet.title: Battle Mages: Sign of Darkness
snippet.description: Battle Mages: Sign Darkness (released in 2004) is an enthralling journey in the world of the original game. The four brand new campaigns, expanded magical tactical abilities, a diverse system of perks, unique units and artifacts are waiting to be discovered.

localized.description: Battle Mages: Sign Darkness (released in 2004) is an enthralling journey in the world of the original game. The four brand new campaigns, expanded magical tactical abilities, a diverse system of perks, unique units and artifacts are waiting to be discovered.
